snippet: Three chief executives - Steven A. Ballmer of Microsoft, Stephen A. Elop of Nokia and Peter Chou of HTC - appeared on stage at an AT&T news conference on Monday to announce the first Windows Phone devices that will be compatible with AT&T's new 4G...
abstract: Three chief executives - Steven A. Ballmer of Microsoft, Stephen A. Elop of Nokia and Peter Chou of HTC - appeared on stage at an AT&T news conference on Monday to announce the first Windows Phone devices that will be compatible with AT&T's new 4G cellular network.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - Three chief executives - Steven A. Ballmer of Microsoft, Stephen A. Elop of Nokia and Peter Chou of HTC - appeared on stage at an AT&T news conference on Monday to announce the first Windows Phone devices that will be compatible with AT&T's new 4G cellular network. Read more on Gadgetwise »

headline.main: Gadgetwise: Fast Windows Phones for AT&T's 4G Network
